game.name: Train Simulator: Guiguang High Speed Railway: Guilin - Hezhou Route Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Fascinating at every passing valley and breath-taking gradient, China’s high-speed network is never one to miss, and a fascinating section has come to life as Union Workshop bring 170km of modern, high-speed operations to Train Simulator. You will be at speed between the towns of Guilin and Hezhou,
